name: One More Press
description:
I had a free afternoon so I figured why not participate in the Juice Jam! Inspired by Jonas Tyroller's video about making a button satisfying to push, but focused entirely on the button rather than using the button to facilitate other mechanics. All you have to do is click the button. But don't stop!

Music: https://www.bensound.com

Button Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/

Woo Sound Effect: Me
